Title: YogaWorks
Business: We are one of the largest and fastest growing providers of high quality yoga instruction in the U.S., with almost 3 million student visits in 2016 and 50 company-owned studios, as well as our Internet-based digital media service, MyYogaWorks.com. YogaWorks is the only national, multi-discipline yoga instruction company, and our highly recognizable brand is present in six geographically dispersed U.S. markets—Los Angeles, Orange County (California), New York City, Northern California, Boston and Baltimore/Washington D.C. Our teachers taught more than 180,000 classes in our conveniently located studios and attracted more than 225,000 students in 2016.
